title: BJ Party masterstroke: Firm Building Uttarakhand Tunnel That Collapsed Donated Rs 55 Crore To BJP Through Electoral Bonds
selftext: Hyderabad-based Navayuga Engineering Company Ltd (NEC), which is constructing the Silkyara-Barkot tunnel in Uttarakhand, a portion of which collapsed last year, purchased Rs 55 crore worth of electoral bonds and donated the entire amount to the BJP, as per data released by the Election Commission.
comments: This government just keeps on delivering. pain, suffering and death that is.
And they get all the votes and support too so guess they are delivering their end of the deal

Just to reiterate that there were _twenty one_ collapses on the same tunnel. And construction is proceeding with no interruption. [Link](https://www.thehindu.com/news/national/silkyara-tunnel-construction-to-restart-as-soon-as-the-debris-is-cleared-nhidcl/article67591660.ece)

Navayuga also was involved in another accident:  

[20 killed in girder machine collapse on Samruddhi Expressway in Thane](https://www.thehindu.com/news/cities/mumbai/construction-workers-dead-in-thane-after-girder-falls-on-samruddhi-expressway/article67144813.ece)  

If it were not for the EB purchase, the firm would have been blacklisted and their directors would have been in prison by now.
These people were responsible for a few flyovers in Mangalore, which took 10+ years to complete. So much corruption
